headline.main: GREAT BATTLES ON; Russians Fighting Hard Against Bryansk and Vyazma Thrusts DESTROYING MANY TANKS Counter-Action Carried Out -- Moscow Reports Victories in North and South

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, Wednesday, Oct. 8 -- General Field Marshal Fedor von Bock's central armies, supported by enormous quantities of tanks, ranging from tiny whippets to lumbering heavy models, and by untold numbers of planes, are trying to break thro ugh toward Moscow at two points.
